background.title: Background & Interests
background.text: Hi, I’m Ella Demarest—a full-stack developer, artist, and creative problem solver. I’m passionate about building robust web applications, experimenting with AI/ML, and creating digital art. My journey spans bioinformatics, game development, and health tech. I’ve studied and worked in Boston and New York, and after spending a summer in NYC during my Regeneron internship, I fell in love with another city while also realizing how much Boston feels like home. I’m still deciding where I’ll settle—but I know I thrive in communities full of innovation, collaboration, and creativity.

funFacts.text: My favorite animes are Attack on Titan and Death Note.
I was in a clinical trial for the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine.
I have over a dozen tree frogs and dart frogs back home.
I attended the Roblox Developer Conference in 2020 (virtual).
I walk 60+ kilometers per week playing Pokemon Go, am level 50, and play with a group in Cambridge every week!
I used to play competitive indoor & beach volleyball but only play for fun now.
My favorite TV show is Silicon Valley.
I have hundreds of hours in Skyrim and am (im)patiently waiting for Elder Scrolls VI.
